title: Enhancing Medical Practical Competencies: Designing Visual Arts Education Projects Using Mobile Devices

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can create visual compositions of three or more elements using mobile devices and digital art applications.
Learners can systematically improve project outcomes through peer feedback and digital portfolios.
Learners can plan and demonstrate visual art content incorporating augmented reality (AR) technology.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
